email_body: No 0-jun 1 indicative offer is 4.85 Sheetal Patel 10/10/2000 01:03 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT, Mike Maggi/Corp/Enron@Enron cc: Charles H Otto/HOU/ECT@ECT Subject: Offers John & Mike, Could you please fill out the attach spreadsheet COB today? There is one swap term and one collar term. It looks like we are getting close to a finance deal and are working with John Thompson in the finance group. The outline quotes would be a buy out of existing deals on Enron's books. Thanks, Sheetal x36740
